title: Universal User Identifier
description: An identifier string & object for all Kelp-anything related profiles, used to aim back to a global stem account.

name.description:
A changeable human readable identifier that is exclusive (while they have it) to a user, that can be used to search for them on diffrent Kelp sites, friend them, etc.

*__Note:__ This defaults to their identifier on whatever platform they created the account from/with. It's only unique to them while they have it.*
